lexUnit.name: post.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: with obj. chiefly Brit. send via the postal system.

sentence.text: However , as he posted his letter on Monday , he has been caught in the suspension trap , and it could be at least a month , before there is any prospect of seeing his money .
